config.config_manager module

Configuration Management System for Dual Environment Setup

This module provides configuration loading, validation, and management for both M1 native and Ubuntu VM environments.

class config.config_manager.OptimizationConfig(threads: int = 4, memory_fraction: float = 0.6, mixed_precision: bool = False, mps_fallback: bool = False, batch_size_multiplier: float = 1.0)[source]
